alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Juab and southeastern Tooele Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 530 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Tooele Army Depot South to near Vernon to 23 miles north of Delta. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Tooele Army Depot South, Rush Valley, Faust, Lofgreen and Little Sahara State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
